body: Jordanian blogger Naseem Tarawnah examines why older generations, rather than youth, have led Jordan's recent demonstrations.  He comments: "Much of the older generation ... are a constituency of people who rely on a flawed system. They want to see that system maintained."
original_body: Jordanian blogger Naseem Tarawnah examines why older generations, rather than youth, have led Jordan's recent demonstrations. He comments: "Much of the older generation ... are a constituency of people who rely on a flawed system. They want to see that system maintained."
title: Jordan: Demonstrations and the Older Generations
